EmailTemplate.name: Quote Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: Salesforce : Your Quote has been rejected by the manager
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Quote.CreatedBy},
Your Quote {!Quote.Name} has been rejected by your manager.
Your manager has given the following reason : {!ApprovalRequest.Comments}
From now, you have to generate a new Quote for your opportunity.
Regards, Your Salesforce administrator
Note : This email has been sent automatically. Do not answer to it.
